results.name: Matula-Goebel number of the planted achiral tree determined by the n-th number whose consecutive prime indices are divisible.
link: Gus Wiseman, The first 81 planted achiral trees corresponding to the first 81 dividing partitions.
example: The sequence of all planted achiral trees begins: o, (o), (oo), ((o)), (ooo), ((oo)), (oooo), (((o))), ((o)(o)), ((ooo)), (ooooo), (((oo))), (oooooo), ((oooo)), ((((o)))), (ooooooo), (((o)(o))), (oooooooo), (((ooo))), ((oo)(oo)).
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Sep 06 2018
